title: Games instantly crash after 6.14 patch
body: After the 6.14 patch every time I try and get in a game it crashes either instantly,or the screen goes black and does nothing,please help.Currently running windows 8.1,if you need more info just ask.

replies.body: It sounds like a hardware or software issue is failing to render the game, and causing it to crash.  Rineyy's link to the [Game Crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide can provide some good steps in resolving your issue.  I confirmed that your ticket has been received, and a tech specialist will respond as soon as possible.  Thanks for your patience!

Same here, I keep getting bugsplats. I also sent Riot support a ticket. Since it's from the new patch could it be something from Riot with the new patch?
Do you have Plays.tv running? if so turn it off. solved my problem

> [{quoted}](name=Hans4,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=8OpUKlnz,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-07-14T00:41:35.786+0000)
>
> Do you have Plays.tv running? if so turn it off. solved my problem

That was it, they released an update today fixing it. It had a problem with recording games that run on DirectX 9, which makes me wonder why league is still running DX 9 :p

Cases like this can usually be due to a corrupt install or unstable rendering.   Sometimes a fix can be as simple as updating a graphics driver (also provided in the guide), and it's unlikely to be an issue with the patch itself.  I see that your ticket has been received!  If the guide wasn't able to resolve this, our tech team can help out as soon as possible.

Well,after hours of fiddling around I finally fixed my problem,just needed to update my drivers.Geforce experience was giving me connection errors for some reason so I had to manually download it.I thank you guys for the help and I hope that anyone that still has problems finds their fix.Also,I know that I've fixed my problem but I still see people that haven't fixed theirs,should I leave this thread open or not?Kinda new here.
